description: Erection of hip to gable and rear dormer roof extensions with installation of 2no. rooflights to the front roofslope of the house
decision_conditions: The proposed erection of hip to gable and rear dormer roof extensions with the installation of 2no. rooflights to the front roofslope of the house falls within the parameters of permitted development as set out under Schedule 2, Part 1, Class B and C of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).
Condition 26 (Construction Environmental Management Plan (CEMP)) - RBK Highway Engineer has reviewed the information submitted and are satisfied this can now be approved.

Please provide the proposed loft plan  at a recognised scale (at 1:50 or 1:100 for example), showing the outline of the entire floor plan, not just part and all key dimensions for the proposed works. The plans must also show the direction of North. Although the inclusion of a scale bar is not mandatory, it is encouraged.
